title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing the CLI and server to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally with minimal setup.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, offering sync/async APIs and chat/completion endpoints.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, usable in Node or browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package allowing Ollama models to be used as LLM or chat components in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (formerly Ollama WebUI) with chat history, model management, and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama exposing synchronous & asynchronous APIs for chat, completion and embeddings.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive terminal UI for chatting with Ollama models, written in Go with bubbletea.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local AI autocomplete and chat using Ollama models.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented generation stack using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to run and chat with Ollama models directly from the editor.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset, adding OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to local Ollama API with session memory.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models to Kubernetes with PVC & autoscaling options.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama service in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing typed async client for Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with chat, completion and embedding endpoints; includes Blazor sample.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-qt
summary: Cross-platform desktop client for Ollama built with Qt6 and C++.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLMs via Ollama for note summarization and Q&A.

title: ollama-rustic
summary: Lightweight Rust CLI wrapper around Ollama with prompt templating and history.
